tests.name: Health Check
tests.recommendation: Start backend services before running tests

testSuites.name: Integration

tests.name: Integration Tests
tests.error:
Command failed: npm run test:integration
FAIL integration/api-endpoints.test.ts
  API Endpoints Integration Tests
    Authentication Endpoints
      ✕ POST /auth/register - should create new user (1 ms)
      ✕ POST /auth/login - should authenticate user
      ✕ POST /auth/login - should reject invalid credentials
    Car Management Endpoints
      ✕ POST /cars - should create a new car (1 ms)
      ✕ GET /cars - should list user cars
      ✕ GET /cars/:id - should get specific car
      ✕ PUT /cars/:id - should update car (1 ms)
    Race Management Endpoints
      ✕ POST /races - should create a new race
      ✕ GET /races - should list races
      ✕ POST /races/:id/join - should join a race
      ✕ GET /races/:id/participants - should list race participants
    User Statistics Endpoints
      ✕ GET /my/stats - should get current user stats
      ✕ GET /leaderboard - should get leaderboard
      ✕ GET /users/:id/stats - should get specific user stats
    Event Management Endpoints
      ✕ GET /events - should list events
      ✕ POST /events - should create new event
    Health and System Endpoints
      ✕ GET /health - should return system health
      ✕ GET / - should return API info
